name: Chasm Runner
description:
Jump over holes as you speed your way through this lava filled chasm.

Controls are Spacebar to jump and A + D to move left and right.

My entry for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1! My first ever jam, and my second complete unity game. 

Not very original but I'm a 13 year old solo dev and I don't have much experience with Unity and I don't know how to 3D model/make textures and game art.

I hope you guys find my game fun!
